get.description: Resource specifying supported and active security profile(s)

post.description: Sets or updates device provisioning status data.

credid.description: A value is returned if the security profile defines its usage. When defined, credid Property refers to the /oic/sec/cred Resource entry where the credential is used to authorize the available security profiles (e.g. OCF Rooted Certificate Chain)

currentprofile.description:
A string specifying the security profile
oic.sec.sp.unspecified - The security profile is not specified
oic.sec.sp.baseline - This specifies the OCF Baseline security profileoic.sec.sp.black - This specifies the OCF Black security profile
oic.sec.sp.blue - This specifies the OCF Blue security profile
oic.sec.sp.purple - This specifies the OCF Purple security profile
